--- title: Longissimus Muscle --- ![Schematic view of the intermediate intrinsic muscles of the back (Erector spinae) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020](/The Archive/Anatomy/Muscles/Muscles of the back/Erector Spinae/images/gilroyatlas 3.9a schematic intermediate back muscles.png){#fig-schematicintermediatebackmm39gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020} ![Intermediate intrinsic muscles of the back / Erector spinae (Posterior view) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020](/The Archive/Anatomy/Muscles/Muscles of the back/Erector Spinae/images/gilroyatlas 310b intermediate back muscles.png){#fig-intermediatebackmm310gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020} ::: {#tbl-longissimus-muscles-oian .cell message='false' tbl-cap='Longissimus muscles' execution_count=1} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ```{=html}
Muscle Origin Insertion Innervation Action
Longissimus capitis T1-T3 TP
C4-C7 TP & articular process		 Mastoid process Spinal nn.
Posterior rami (lateral br.)
C1 - C5		 Bilateral: Head extension
Unilateral: Ipsilateral head sidebend, Ipsilateral rotation
Longissimus cervicis T1-T6 TP C2-C5 TP Spinal nn. Posterior rami (lateral br.)
C1 - C5		 Bilateral: Extends spine
Unilateral: Ipsilateral spine sidebend
Longissimus thoracis Sacrum
Iliac crest
Lumbar vertebrae SP
Lower thoracic TP		 2-12 Ribs
Thoracic TP
Lumbar TP		 Spinal nn. Posterior rami (lateral br.)
C1 - C5		 Bilateral: Extends spine
Unilateral: Ipsilateral spine sidebend
``` ::: ::: # Longissimus Capitis ## Origin {#origin} T1-T3 (TP), C4-C7 (TP & articular process) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Insertion {#insertion} Temporal bone (Mastoid process) ## Innervation {#innervation} [Spinal nn. C1-L5 (Posterior Rami, lateral branches)]({{< var ref-spinal-nerves.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Action {#action} - BIL: Extends head @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - UNIL: Flexes and I/L rotation @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Longissimus Cervicis ## Origin {#origin} T1-T6 (TP) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Insertion {#insertion} C2-C5 (TP) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Innervation {#innervation} [Spinal nn. C1-L5 (Posterior Rami, lateral branches)]({{< var ref-spinal-nerves.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Action {#action} - BIL: Extends spine @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - UNIL: I/L SB @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Longissimus Thoracis ## Origin {#origin} Sacrum; Iliac crest; Lumbar vertebrae (SP); Lower thoracic vertebrae (TP) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Insertion {#insertion} 2nd-12th ribs; Thoracic & Lumbar vertebrae (TP) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Innervation {#innervation} [Spinal nn. C1-L5 (Posterior Rami, lateral branches)]({{< var ref-spinal-nerves.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Action {#action} - BIL: Extends spine @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - UNIL: I/L SB @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020
